boardgame.name: Kreta
boardgame.description: Players use different character cards to bring in and move pieces around Kreta which give them influence in the provinces on the island. One of the cards triggers scoring in all the provinces adjacent to a place, and each province gives various Victory Points (VPs) to the 1st and 2nd most influence. At any time, you only know the next two places that will score, so if you cannot gain influence the current place, you can prepare for the next scoring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has an identical set of characters, and each character controls certain pieces which have different abilities and limitations in the game. By smart use of your characters and clever timing, you can try to have the scoring occur when you have the most influence, and gain more VPs than the other players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But influence changes swiftly, the others can quickly conspire to block your control, and the scoring places can jump from one end of the island to the other, leaving you controlling worthless provinces. Can you make the right choices to gain influence in the right place at the right time, or will you be left watching as someone else takes power in Kreta?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the publisher, Goldsieber: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Settle the most important Cretan provinces with your followers. Build booming cities and increase your influence by building massive towers. Locate your fleet carefully but also try to harvest as many grapes and olives as possible. Only he who best places his Admiral, King, Farmers and Castellan will end up winning the race for power and prestige!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Online Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;http://www.mabiweb.com_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;http://www.mabiweb.com_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; (turn-based)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

never played +++++ german version, but game parts are completely language independent and you can find rules translations on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Opened and punched/bagged but never played. They made a little boo-boo with this copy: they put in an extra house but left out a ship for green (and only the green color, the other colors are OK). Doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t seem like a big deal to me, just turn the extra house upside down and it can pass for a ship. Of course, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve heard that Goldsieber might be able to fix this for you, even here in the U.S., so you could try that too. I prefer paypal, but will also accept check or money order (though it will be slower). I ship by USPS parcel post with delivery confirmation. If you order several games from me, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course combine the shipping costs.

Like new condition. Player aids unpunched. Includes 4 copies of the player aid translated into English and 3 copies of the rules translated into English, including two different translations. ============================================== The games I am selling come from my personal collection. I often have bought games used or traded for them. I will do my best to accurately describe their condition. I will confirm completeness in most cases (unless stated otherwise) but not for items that come in large quantities for which a few missing will make no difference (like stacks of paper money for example). Please note that I am not concerned about inserts and may have removed them from a game that I felt didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need them. I might not think to mention that in the description. If you are interested in the insert, please ask. Note that our home is smoke-free but not pet-free. I can not guarantee the complete absence of cat hair in the boxes I prefer to ship via USPS Priority. I use non-Flat Rate boxes unless it will save you money for me to use Flat Rate boxes. I buy the postage on-line and charge the exact cost to the buyer. I am happy to combine multiple items to save you on shipping I have perfect feedback here on BGG. On ebay, where I am selling my record collection, I am ronattic, and have 100% positive feedback. So please buy with confidence.
